scripts.test: npm --prefix ../core run build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf dist/core && mkdir -p dist/core/dist && cp -R ../core/dist/* dist/core/ && cp -R ../core/dist/* dist/core/dist/ && node dist/tests/credits.test.js && node dist/tests/passport.test.js && node dist/tests/comments.test.js && node dist/tests/node-verify.test.js && node dist/tests/node-verify-endpoint.test.js
